title: Pure Punishment
description: ***Warning: Intended for a mature audience 18+ years old   One, Two. Who to kill? Three, four. You better open your door. Five, six. Cut or nick? Seven, eight. Donâ€™t party too late. Nine, ten. Watch your gate. My name is Kayla. Would you like to play a game with me? I promise to only make you bleed and possibly scream. Are you ready for some fun?   Please note, this book is a standalone.
author: T.L.  Smith
